items: Start by sitting on a chair or bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Place the Tiger Tail Forearm on your lap with the roller facing up.
Place your forearm on top of the roller with your palm facing down.
Slowly roll the Tiger Tail Forearm up and down your forearm, applying pressure as needed.
Continue rolling for 1-2 minutes, then switch to the other forearm.
Repeat as needed throughout the day to relieve tension and improve circulation in your forearms.
Helps prevent wrist and forearm injuries
Can improve performance in activities that require grip strength and forearm endurance, such as rock climbing or weightlifting
Can be done with minimal equipment and in a variety of settings
